## AuthContainer.revokeSession() method

Revokes the specified user session.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
revokeSession(id: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | <code>string</code> | Session ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
